title: Still can't receive awards after games
body: I was unbanned well over two months ago for swearing at team mates-led to a 14 day ban. Fixed my behavior and have tried to be super nice. People honor me almost every game and I've made tons of friends. Why am I still restricted from receiving awards? If this continues I might as well just restart on a new account, but I don't wanna waste four years of league for something fixable. Is this a glitch that my restrictions have lasted so long or is there a trick to get out of restricitons? thankyou.

replies.body: Loot restrictions aren't lifted over a set amount of time. Once your punishment is over, you go into a "reform" period where you need to continue to show good sportsmanship before the loot restriction is lifted. You can read up on the smaller details of those restrictions [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions).

I understand that, however I don't understand what scales how well we do "teamwork." I feel like Im respecting my teammates much more now but noone honors anyone anymore so I don't know how its decided whether or not we have improved. I play a lot of league and it sucks to see that Im not getting recognized for making an effort to improve my behavior.
